description.value:
The presence of a vrykolakas master inspires savage creatures to crawl forth to do its bidding, including @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Rat Swarm]{Rat Swarms}, @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Warg]{Wargs}, @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Werewolf]{Werewolves}, and similar creatures.

The vrykolakas master can give telepathic orders to these creatures within 100 feet, but they can't communicate back.

name: (Vampire, Vrykolakas Master) Children of the Night
